[Groovy] Class BulletedList

  com.vaadin.ui.AbstractComponent

                  org.grails.plugin.vaadin.ui.BulletedList

class BulletedList
extends com.vaadin.ui.GridLayout

Mimics an HTML bulleted list (i.e. the '<ul>' tag)

Authors:
Francis McKenzie

Property Summary
java.lang.String bulletSymbol

Use this to change the bullet symbol that is used when adding new rows
static java.lang.String defaultBulletSymbol

Provides way of globally changing the default bullet symbol, if no explicit bullet symbol is specified when constructing this bulleted list.

Property Detail

bulletSymbol

java.lang.String bulletSymbol
Use this to change the bullet symbol that is used when adding new rows

defaultBulletSymbol

static java.lang.String defaultBulletSymbol
Provides way of globally changing the default bullet symbol, if no explicit bullet symbol is specified when constructing this bulleted list.
